DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety tolerability single multiple dos LY2495655 administer subcutaneously intravenously Japanese subject .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Single dose cohort Overtly healthy male female , determine medical history physical examination Between age 24 50 year Multiple dose cohort Sedentary male females stable medical problem , , , investigator 's opinion , place subject increase risk participate study interfere interpretation data Between age 50 85 year Score < 600 Metabolic Equivalent Tasks ( METs ) per week base International Physical Activity Questionnaire ( IPAQ ) All subject Male subject : agree use reliable method birth control Female subject : woman childbearing potential due surgical sterilization ( least 6 week post surgical bilateral oophorectomy without hysterectomy tubal ligation ) confirm medical history , menopause Up third generation Japanese , define subject 's biological grandparent exclusive Japanese descent born Japan Are ambulatory able perform stair climb test Have clinical laboratory test within normal reference range population investigator site , result acceptable deviation judge clinically significant investigator Have venous access sufficient allow blood sample and/or administration investigational product intravenous administration Single dose cohort Intend use counter prescription medication within 14 day prior dose 2 month dose except thyroid replacement hormone nonabsorbed topical preparation per investigator instruction Abnormal supine blood pressure define diastolic blood pressure > 90 mmHg and/or systolic blood pressure > 140 mmHg Multiple dose cohort If take medication , subject stable least 3 month , time require produce stable effect drug Abnormal supine blood pressure define > 100 mmHg and/or systolic blood pressure > 160 mmHg All subject Have know allergy LY2495655 , related compound component formulation Have history presence cardiovascular , respiratory ( include moderate severe restrictive lung disease obstructive disease , chronic bronchitis , symptomatic asthma ) , hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal , endocrine , hematological , neurological disorder capable constitute risk take study medication interfere interpretation data Have history seizure convulsion , exclude febrile convulsion childhood Subjects underlying muscle disease history muscle disease ( example , polymyositis rhabdomyolysis ) Evidence recent history significant active psychiatric disease schizophrenia , depression , bipolar disorder Recent immobilization major trauma leg within 6 month Knee hip replacement low extremity amputation Participate , participate within 3 month study drug administration , regular resistance
